Any.Comments: Move some faces to make way for a pillar.

Convert an unsed switch into a key.
Move it somewhere reachable. Conditional changes below may shift it elsewhere.
Move the doors into the new room to avoid flickering.
Take another unused switch from City, and turn it into a door.
Move it to the new room.
